Titulo: a great place to pay homage to the great painter and celebrated son of guanajuato

es una visita obligada en guanajuato la casa es linda con las habitaciones ambientadas en la epoca de infancia de rivera tambien se presenta obra de diego y de otros contemporaneos como orozco y siqueiros adultos mayores y estudiantes pagan tarifa con descuento

museum was nice it has multiple floors that showcase other artists when we visited much of diegos work was on loan to other international museums yet what made up for not seeing diego s work were the exhibits of orozco and siqueiros both amazing and as historically important artists
i really enjoyed the diego rivera museum there were interesting displays from other artists as well

this museum really gives you insight into the life of diego rivera without putting all the attention on his wife frida kalho many drawings and sketches on display that he used to design his famous murals the house has authentic decor a nice mixture of museum and gallery

diego rivera is one of mexicos most prominent artist it is the home and birth place of diego rivera and converted into a museum displaying his works and restoring the house to re create it as it was at the time of his birth the staff are exteme knowledge and passionate about the artist and the art displayed in the museum the museum is located on the north side of the historic center of guanajuato and is spread across three floors displaying a variety of his art work to show how he passed through various disciplines and styles seeing his work in such an intimate setting really is something special in addition they also have some interesting exhibits of contemporary artist definitely worth a visit picture taking is not allowed

exposicion de diego las cuales muestran otras exposiciones temporales de altisimo nivel igual hay paseos con guias si no eres muy conocedor de arte puedes contratar uno pero el museo esta simplemente para admirar el arte
visitar esta bella ciudad y no ir a la casa de diego rivera es como nunca haber estado en guanajuato es mas que recomendable es parte de nuestra historia contemporanea

diegos artwork exhibition is very complete from the beginnings to his famous murals other temporary exhibitions were also interesting very big mistake to dont open the childrens room and the tshirt store on sundays

we thoroughly enjoyed this museum which is in diego riveras home from birth to age 5 or so this museum has some of the home restored to the time of his life spent there as well as a great deal of art including a fabulous mural in a theater room we were accompanied by a tour guide who was showing us the city he helped us understand the characters and meaning of the mural we enjoyed it all very much
se pueden apreciar bastantes obras de arte de muchas personas no solo de diego rivera y de muchos estilos
si bien el museo no goza de las mejores piezas de diego a mi entender sus murales nos guia por la variedad de estilos que atraveso el artista sin lugar a duda de los mejores latinoamericanos
es una exposicion compartida con otros artistas no tan conocidos la casa es donde diego vivio de nino muy ordenado y moderno a la vez

padrisimo y hermosisima exposicion de diego y tienen otras exposiciones temporales de altisimo nivel igual hay paseos con guias si no eres muy conocedor de arte puedes contratar uno pero el museo esta como para sentarte y meterte a cada pintura unos 15 minutos y con guias esto no es posible es realmente hermoso super recomendado

Titulo: diego rivera lugar de nacimiento y la exposicion de algunas de sus obras
Opinion: el lugar de nacimiento de diego rivera tambien conocido como un companero de la vida de frida kahlo esta situado en el centro historico de guanajuato es una mezcla de museo de su origen la informacion acerca de su trabajo y lo mas importante tambien hay fotografias dibujos y otras obras de su visita se obtiene una buena vision general de su vida y su obra

weve been to many riverakahlo exhibits in different cities this is a unique opportunity to see his earlier work including drawings and sketches he did as a student look closely and see the genius that created the famous paintings and murals later on yes there are stairs here the elevator was not working i dont know how often that happens

Titulo: only if youre a diehard fan
Opinion: we were on a day trip to guanajuato from san miguel and one of our party really wanted to see this museum diego rivera only lived here as a child for about 6 years the furniture is not his familys but is of the era one floor was set as the home one displayed early works and sketches of the artist and one floor had traveling exhibits it was ok but we left sort of underwhelmed i can see why the city wants to honor him and preserve his home but it was not particularly illuminating if you are only in town one day there may be other sights more interesting

en la exposicion se revive el origen de diego rivera y se aprecia el estilo de vida en sus primeros anos ademas se exhiben obras de arte por epoca y los distintos movimientos artisticos por los cuales fue evolucionando inevitablemente debes de apreciar su obra llamada post guerra
this is a small place but has an interesting collection of furniture and photos from diego riveras childhood and family also a collection of his artwork and related piecessketches etc
murals in the chapel should not be missed mostly a collectionof his early sketches not a single rivera painting interesting nonetheless
la casa de la infancia de diego restaurado a tan bueno como vivo un agradable paseo a traves de sin embargo las pinturas son captadores de atencion reales muchos estilos diferentes y todas preciosas
it is nicely laid out with much needed air conditioning on the hot day i wanted to see more of frida of course
i enjoyed visiting this museum it is nicely maintained with some beautiful art work both from diego rivera and his friends and colleagues

Titulo: la casa de la infancia de rivera
Opinion: esta casa era yod rivera vivio hasta los 6 anos de edad siguen siendo los muebles y cuadros de la epoca que ayuda mucho a entender el principio de su vida artistica merece la pena ir
i only knew diego rivera as frida khalos husband but after touring his home and works i have a much better appreciation of what a true visionary he was

the museum is a lovely piece of architecture to begin with it is partially in the restored house where he was born and spent his early years i love the paintings and was fascinated with the sketches he had done as a prelude to painting i believe while i thoroughly enjoyed it i wished to see even more of his work i could have spent another hour there
en excelente estado de conservacion muy buenos trabajos expuestos no solo de diego rivera la gente en recepcion y el museo muy amable y accesible

Titulo: regreso a la infancia de rivera
Opinion: alli vivio hasta la edad de seis anos ademas de los muebles que adornan la casa en ese momento el museo cuenta con una excelente coleccion del artista tiene una pequena tienda con algunas ofertas
un museo que esta muy interesante esta muy completo y se aprende y te das cuenta de cosas que ni te imaginas aunque esta pequeno el museo pero bonito
hermoso espacio conocer la obra de diego rivera es asombrosa y acondicionaron muy bien el inmueble moderno com altos techos pequeno pero muy recomendable

la casa esta muy cuidada y la informacion que se expone es clara tambien las exposiciones temporales son muy interesantes es una lastima que no tengan abierta la terraza que supongo que funcionaba como cafeteria ademas la tienda tiene muy pocos objetos

la arquitectura de la casa es muy linda la ambientacion de la decoracion no tiene el picante que uno esperaria encontrar sorprendentes las exposiciones temporales con artistas de excelente creatividad y calidad
anything to do with diego rivera has to be seen he was quite a man this house is where he lived for his initial six years and it has been restored quite well must do

Titulo: es una bonita finca pero uno espera mas efectos personales
Opinion: en la finca solo vivio de los 1 a los 6 anos no era propiedad de sus padres arrendaban solo el 1er piso la finca fue un tanto transformada con formato museo y uno va con la idea de ver la finca real las obras son muy interesantes pero sin resena de cuando se pinto o cual fue el fin por lo que es como galeria no museo el personal tiene una excelente actitud eso lo reconozco e hizo un del recorrido algo muy interesante que si vale la pena visitar y mas por su cercania a la universidad o plazuela la gente de tercera edad subia por las escaleras nadie les dijo del elevador y daban pena preocupante

si bien el museo casa diego rivera te llevara a recordar a uno de los mejores pintores muralistas de nuestro pais sus espacios su forma de vida tener la oprtunidad de observar sus obras originales es realmente unico a los amantes del arte no se lo pueden perder quien vaya con ninos hay una biblioteca donde estos pequenos acompanados de un adulto pueden esperar

strangely there is very little biographical information about rivera at the museum the artwork was interesting but would have been more so if we had had more context there was information in english on some of the walls of the gallery but it was poorly translated from spanish and so not very helpful in the projection room there are many group photos but none of them are captioned this museum is on 3 or 4 levels and you must climb many stairs on the positive side in the gift shop we found an excellent map of guanajuato 30 pesos which i had been looking for ages
solo un edificio de nueva construccion en el lugar de nacimiento de la fundacion nacida diego rivera paso su infancia no hay que esperar que lo hara muy beneficioso para la salud

este lugar de verdad vale la pena el diseno de esta casa en donde nacio diego rivera es muy interesante tienen un area super moderna estan varias de sus pinturas y su historia el personal que tiene en cada aula esta super capacitado no recuerdo el costo exacto ya que entramos a varios lugares hoy pero maximo 30 pesos

Titulo: diego and quite a bit more
Opinion: rivera lived only 6 years in this house but the curators do a good job of recreating the context of his early life they also include a variety of his art work to show how he passed through various disciplines and styles seeing his work in such an intimate setting really is something special in addition they also have some very interesting exhibitions of contemporary artists some of which really caught our eye they have a lot of printed information in english and guides are available though i cant comment on costs or whether they speak english overall this attraction has plenty to offer we are not especially artsy but even my teen daughters were very happily entertained during our 90minute visit the house is just 100 metres west of the university steps

incluso que no haya mas obras de rivera visitar la casa donde vivio la familia del pintor es ineludible la propiedad esta muy bien cuidada hay muchos cuadros expuestos y guia que nos acompano estaba bien entrenado

Titulo: bien pero no hay mucho que ver
Opinion: muy agradable el lugar y con exposiciones de otros pintores lo malo es que no hay guias turisticos que expliquen sobre la casa
there are some beautiful artworks in this museum and it is very well presented and layer out a must visit while in guanajuato

Titulo: imperdonable perderse la visita a este lugar
Opinion: me gusto mucho recorrer la casa con toda tranquilidad el recorrido te lleva por cada habitacion de la casa pero a la vez puedes ver la evolucion y la influencia que la epoca marcaba en la vida del gran pintor ademas existen otras exposiciones de diferentes autores en la tienda me hubiera encantado encotrar mas litografias de las obras de diego rivera no tuve suerte creo que les falta material

un museo completo con obras de distintas epocas y estilos de diego rivera bien complementando con exposiciones temporales de otros artistas en un ambiente especial por ser uno de los hogares del artista

Titulo: much more than just diego rivera
Opinion: i really enjoyed visiting this museum the diego rivera was acceptable but i really loved some of the other featured artists o ne in particular daryn williams i hope that is correct also some of the historical information is in english too
enjoyed the tour of the home as well as the art work displayed there were other artists works displayed as well

Titulo: a must if you are a fan of painting
Opinion: this is the place where diego rivera and his twin brother were born i had no idea that his brother who died at s young age was his twin so the place is very interesting it contains some of his of art since his beginnings i liked in particular the sketches just be advised that it will prove to be not very easy for someone with nobility issues
no los mejores museos de la rivera pero tiene la distincion de ser la casa en la que nacio solo para los aficionados

interesting museum to see the artists formative years and how his work evolved during his life although he only spent 6 years of his childhood here theres a considerable amount of his artwork on display

Titulo: abrumado por el mural pintado en la escalera
Opinion: el interior es que hay una gran cantidad de exposiciones y explicaciones que no se aburre en particular se dejan en la memoria es escaleras al lado del mural es un magnifico fue abrumado ver solo la imagen representada y no puede evitar sentir un anhelo melancolia
tiene visita guiada la casa es muy bonita y tiene muchas pinturas d elos inicios de diego rivera hay descuento para estudiantes vale la pena entrar
always essential to understanding the social background of a region are its museums this city is no exception this museo is well worth your time

Titulo: a mustsee for fans of rivera and contemporary art
Opinion: obviously this museum will give you a great deal of information on dg plenty of his work to admire here the bonus is that the museum also has temporary exhibitions by other contemporary artists in february there is an exhibition on sw african indigenous people as well as an exhibition by a mexican painter of great talent

we thoroughly enjoyed our visit to this museumart gallery we enjoyed learning more about diego rivera and his incredible art work it was also interesting to see that this was his home the museum and art works are welldisplayed there were exhibits of works by other artists and photographers too which we enjoyed
we were amazed at the quality of the art exhibits rivera originals were incredible we learned so much the museum was full of surprises too
i enjoyed the period piece furniture and the collected works of diego rivera more biography would have been nice for visitors who arent familiar with his work

se puede apreciar su vida y obra como ese gran artista que fue la casa se encuentra en muy buen estado y hay varias pinturas y dibujos autenticos hay una biblioteca donde encontre a una historiadora que te puede aclarar ciertas dudas sobre su obra

Titulo: a modest museum for rivera fans
Opinion: this is not a spectacular museum where you will see riveras master works but it was pleasant to poke around in for a while it is the house where rivera was born and the first level has some of the rooms from the house in those days the upper floors have galleries of his work it was somewhat interesting to see his early work but nothing stood out as spectacular there is also a gallery that shows temporary exhibits and when we visited it was a beautiful photo exhibit of african people and subjects
enjoyed our visit to this beautiful museum great information and art from diego rivera we also enjoyed the wonderful photographs on the top floor from africa
this museum is housed in the artists home and while it features a number of riveras works it does little to explain his life and artwork the museum could be so much better and more interactive
es un gran museo sobre la vida de diego rivera pero le falta atraer mas al visitante no solo basarse en el tiempo que el vivio ahi
first class and fun the rivera childhood home has been converted to a museum for his work and other contemporary local artists we enjoyed it tremendously and felt rewarded by our visit
the art museums all in a row so easy to go from one to another modern motion sensor lights for each art display art museums end at an airy yet indoor restaurant

Titulo: una opcion para conocer al gran maestro
Opinion: era una tarde lluviosa y decidimos acudir a visitar la casa donde nacio el famoso pintor mexicano diego rivera tengo entendido que este fue abierto como museo en el ano de 1975 su acervo en exhibicion forma parte de la importante coleccion del ing marte r gomez incluyendo desde obras realizadas durante su infancia como cabeza clasica hasta sus ultimas obras realizadas un ano antes de su muerte en 1956 como paloma de la paz y madame libet adicionalmente su acervo cuenta con la coleccion de diversos artistas en nuestro caso nostoco admirar una coleccio fotografica muy interesante me toco observar una terraza que se veia muy agradable al parecer para comer algo pero estaba cerrad o todavia en remodelacion

the museum is very nice there are artifacts of the house with a few example rooms as well as art galleries in addition to drs work another photographer had a display so there is plenty to see a decent way to spend an hour for a mere 25 pesos
es un lugar montado a fuerzas otro mas con fines de lucro de origen sin embargo tiene un espacio para la exhibicion de arte contemporaneo lo cual lo hace un lugar de interes

no me gusto nada es una casa en la que diego vivio hasta los 6 anos de edad la mayor parte de los cuartos son dedicados a otros pintores o fotografos de diego unicamente son cuadros de cuando hacia cubismo y unos cuantos dibujos a carbon no hay guias y las personas encargada tenian aire de indiferencia a mas no poder
excited that id be seeing diego riveras home and museum my expectations were of more there was so little to see of the works of diego rivera
si bien la casa es pequena puedes observar obras no tan conocidas del autor lo cual te haran apreciar un poco mas de su arte el recorrido es corto pero muy interesante

Titulo: fui a guanajuato solo por eso
Opinion: es pequena puedes recorrerla en 20 mts aun conservan la cama original pero lo mas bello son las cartas de amor a frida y algunos de sus obras me quede en un hotel al lado del teatro es su casa donde nacio de alli que es pequena y no tiene grandes jardines como la de frida en df

Titulo: the art is interesting and if you are fan of diego worth the visit
Opinion: its a relatively small museum the art is interesting i didnt really get much from the home side of the visit i didnt feel like i was actually in his home but rather a mock up its very nice inside and worth the time to visit if you are in town for a week
un hermoso museo para el gran artista que fue diego rivera las pinturas y fotografias que se exponen excelentes para mi gusto

hermosa pieza de historia la casa es la casa donde nacio diego y presenta varias obras suyas disponen de exhibiciones temporales tambien les recomiendo entrar al auditorio y ver detenidamente el mural del paseo en la alameda

me parecio interesante para conocer el lugar de nacimiento de diego rivera la planta baja de la casa muestra original y la parte superior hay salas de exhibicion con hermosas obras de este autor tambien hubo exposiciones fotograficas muy bellas la casa esta bien mantenido y el acceso y facil

visitar esta casamuseo resulto muy gratificante ya que posee excelente museografia y nos acerca mucho a la historia del pintor mexicano ademas es sede de otras excelentes exposiciones las cuales tambien poseen gran calidad para fines de perfeccionar la estadia quiza habria de enriquecer un poco mas el contenido de su tienda boutique ya que es muy pequena considerando la dimension del personaje aunque el encargado de esta area fue muy atento y conocedor del lugar y de guanajuato en general ya que nos proporciono excelentes orientaciones sin duda regresare a este lugar
its a nice place but a bit of a hike up the hill short on his art work mostly about his early years

una forma rapida y muy didactica de conocer un poco de la vida y obra de este gran pintor mexicano las obras expuestas son originales por lo que se aprecia mejor el gran talento del autor imprescindible cuando se visita guanajuato

excelente opcion para visitar y descubrir un poco mas de la vida de un gran pintor para disfrutarlo hay que tomarse su tiempo y disfrutar cada una de sus salas actualmente esta renovado as que vale la pena visitarlo de nuevo si ya fuiste esta compuesto por varios pisos donde encontraras no solo objetos de cuando era una casa habitacion sino bocetos de pinturas muy reconocidas de diego ademas es muy economico tiene un costo de 20 pesos y si llevas credencial de estudiante maestro o adulto mayor la entrada es de 5 pesos

con excelente restauracion y adecuacion a la exposicion de una parte importante de la vida del artista este magnifico recinto nos recuerda la grandeza y claridad de pensamiento de diego rivera visita muy recomendada para aquellos que gustan de la vida de este renombrado pintor

Titulo: buena seleccion de pinturas de diferentes epocas
Opinion: el edificio donde diego rivera vivio los primeros anos es pequeno no entendia la exposicion en el primer piso el desarrollo tecnico de los cientificos en diferentes momentos en los pisos superiores de una coleccion como no hay obra mas conocida del artista pero skompanovany modo que la linea mas alla de revelar el talento del artista en todos los lados no se puede quitar la parte superior en la parte inferior hay unas pocas habitaciones la situacion en la que se reproduce aquella en la que nacio el artista futuro barato

no hay mucho que hacer aqui con el argumento de que fue la casa donde nacio y vivio los primeros 6 anos de su vida atraen al turista mejor inviertan su tiempo en el museo de arte moderno que esta un poco mas adelante

this is where diego rivera was bornhis daughter bought the property back and has created a wonderful museum which shows the house furnished in the style of the time later 19th centuryupper floors have been intimate galleries including sketches and drawings of diego as well as an auditorium with a reproduction of one of his most famous murals there are additional galleries on the upper floor to showcase contemporary artists as well as photographers currently one features the photos of the nomadic peoples of angola
diego rivera lived here as a child house and ajacent building purchased to house 175 works of his a must for art lovers gteat 15 to 20 minute explanation of the mural done for rockafelar

desde luego uno de los museos imperdibles de la ciudad tiene una coleccion amplia de las obras y dibujos de diego rivera ademas de que en la planta baja puedes recorrer algunas de las habitaciones amuebladas ademas de las obras de diego tienen aproximadamente 4 colecciones de otros artistas pintura y fotografia que tambien son muy buenas la casa ha sido restaurada y tiene toques contemporaneos pero conserva su esencia tiene una terraza con mesas al parecer con una vista muy linda a la que no pudimos acceder por que estaba cerrada
el museo esta bien pero esperaba que hubiera mas arte de diego rivera en realidad son unos cuantos bocetos y cuadros y la mayoria de las salas exhiben arte de otros autores

es fantastico conocer el lugar donde diego rivera crecio y fue adquiriendo sus habilidades en el arte este es un buen lugar para comenzar a conocer la vida de este hombre y despues pasar a la ciudad de mexico y visitar sus murales en bellas artes

diego rivera es una garantia para atraer gente sin embargo el museo me quedo a deber muchisimo no tiene un orden en su exposicion mas de la mitad de las pinturas carecen de ficha tecnica y aunque es interesante conocer el inmueble visitarlo no es indispensable en un viaje a guanajuato

un museo montado donde naciera y viviera su ninez el maestro diego rivera la calle donde se encuentra es facil de encontrar es la misma que da a la parte trasera de la alhondiga de granaditas aun se conserva el mobiliario de su familia y los primeros bosquejos de muchas pinturas incluso su breve incursion en otros estilos como el cubismo tiene una cuota de recuperacion la entrada totalmente desquitados en los 3 o 4 pisos de exposicion
this birth home of rivera shows the evolution of his work as well as offers exhibits by other artists

Titulo: lovely building great permanent collection great exhibitions
Opinion: 1 of the nicest small museums ive been in anywhere not just in mexico both for the interesting permanent collection of drs early work and also for the 2 great exhibitions that were on when i was there the building is lovely too theyve done a good job on it cheap too

Titulo: very interesting if you like rivera
Opinion: we went to the casa azul frieda khalo and diego riveras home in mexico city and decided to visit this museum while in guanajuato we learned quite a bit about diegos life and were able to enjoy an excellent onewoman show about the lives of women in guanajuato highly recommended

Titulo: enough to wear out a fan
Opinion: the man was born here and he credits the colors of his childhood here with his later artistic sensibilities there are five floors with considerable to see on each besides the permanent exhibits there are galleries with special shows so this is a museum to return to and recommend

una visita obligada en la ciudad de guanajuato encontraran pinturas originales de este extraoridianrio artista mexicano como exposiones interantes han intervenido la casa que fue el hogar de diego con estructuras modernas en la parte superior hay un cafe pero estaba cerrando cuendo fuimos

after living in this home until a young age diego never returned here there were some of his early works his sketches and drawings and a very few oils there was no humidity or temperature controls and i feel the pain of the art work as it suffers with its ill treatment
small museum but has some interesting pieces of diego rivera art in it best seen with a tour guide a 10 minute walk from the main square

hay una pequena entrada al edificio rojo trate de entrar y que lugar las cosas que tienen un lugar en el que vivia en un museo en hay una serie de exposiciones ampliamente no era impresionante se observo cuando se tomo la foto

es una de las visitas obligadas si vas a guanajuato se pueden ver varias obras de diego rivera asi como en general su vida esta muy bien cuidada y si vas pide la visita guiada te daran varios datos interesantes sobre el y sus obras
bonito museo pero hay exhibicion de obras de otros artistas la casa no contiene muebles originales de cuando vivi el artista son solo para ambientar el precio accesibe 20 pesos
me gusta mucho la casa aunque sinceramente no me interesa saber a que jugaba de nino diego rivera prefiero saber sobre sus obras y el legado que ha dejado

Titulo: bien vale la pena la visita
Opinion: me ha gustado haber ido al museo esta era la casa en la que nacio y vivio hasta los seis anos de diego rivera una de sus hijas cerca del gobierno de guanajuato convirtio la casa en un museo y conocio a muchas de sus obras enfriar es ver muchos dibujos y pinturas del artista ya que es mas conocido por sus grandes murales en la ciudad de mexico la coleccion es grande en la planta baja que era donde vivia la familia fue vuelto a montar la decoracion de la epoca y desde el segundo piso hay varias obras del artista diego no ha visto la propiedad transformado en museo desde fallecio antes pero sabia que su hija porque en el momento de regresar la propiedad que todavia estaba vivo y estaba alli para ver

Titulo: el empiezo de un gran muralista mexicano
Opinion: el comienzo de esta casa es sorprendente la exibicion de diego te dejara impactado de principio a fin no puedes irte sin visitar la casa es un museo obligado a visitar
la estancia de uno de los grandes de la pintura mexicana es lugar obligado para visitar muy centrico

based in a house his parents owned there is a recreation of the typical furniture on the ground floors on the upper floors are a selection of his paintings describing his influences and motivation its a small museum so you must make time to pop in if you pass by
it will take you not more than an hour to visit this place if you like diego rivera art this is the place it has some nice art gallery of his work
el lugar de nacimiento de diego rivera el lugar tiene obras frescos y se siente bien observar la casa tiene una habitacion con una foto de el con kalho
encontraras obras ineditas y podras observar detalles del monumental mural que pinto en 1947 solicita la visita guiada para apreciar otros detalles interesantes

Titulo: loved the house learned about riveras early years
Opinion: this little museum is worth a visit for a couple of reasons its interesting to see the interior of a typical 19th century middleclass house and the beautiful antique furnishings its even more interesting to see the progression of diego riveras artistic style and to view some of the upandcoming mexican artists a great way to spend an afternoon
buen lugar y definitivamente vale la pena ver sin embargo no habia muchas pinturas de diego rivera frida kalho sin embargo muchos otros buenos artistas bonita casa y una bonita vista desde el techo

Titulo: me gusto por las exhibiciones temporales
Opinion: es un lugar pequeno que alberga distintas obras de arte tienen algunas de diego rivera y tambien presentan de otros artistas creo que me gustaron mucho mas las de otros artistas en el tiempo que fui estaban las obras de miguel hernandez urban que pinturas tan hermosas independientemente de las fechas que visites gto y de las obras expuestas tienes que ir

Titulo: hit this place after breakfast walk those chilaquiles off
Opinion: stayed a block away from this place had the intention of going in at some point but didnt get to until my last day went in after having breakfast across the street and was very pleased with the exhibits they have on display one of the floors is dedicated to riveras original work and the other floors offer exhibits from different artists i thought it was a cool idea that the house where rivera was born and raised is now being used as an art museum

el museo esta ubicado en la casa donde nacio diego rivera la planta baja esta ambientada para que te des una idea de como vivio sus primeros anos y los pisos superiores exhiben una buena cantidad de obras este museo fue una muy grata sorpresa
fascinating insights into drs background and evolving artistic identity beautiful museum in lovely part of town
the whole house is pure beauty and art you see so much of diegos earlier work and influences inspirational place for any individual a must do while in guanajuato

para tener una mejor idea de lo que se vera ahi hay que aclarar que no fue la casa de diego sino la casa de sus padres donde vivio sus primeros anos la casa cuenta con una muestra de muchas piezas del artista sin incluir las mas famosas pero muy interesantes por los diferentes angulos de la vida y desarrollo artistico de diego tambien hay una biografia muy completa del pintor

a womanizer a communist sympathizer and a masterful painter all traits that d rivera managed to embody is his paintings throughout his life the museum that houses some of drs paintings here is a roomafterroom arrangement of a two story affair with a good sampling of his works i think my favorites of his paintings contain snipits of early campesino life the simple mexican folksiness he was so good at illustrating and sharing in his paintings some of the exhibits will give you a better idea of the driving forces for this painter the history of his life and his sometimes explosive relationship with f kahlo is a tale good enough for a hollywood movie oh thats right they did make a movie of his life regardless when you have had your fill of taking pictures of picturesque cobblestone streets quaint fountain sporting plazas and political monuments take a break from the street and step inside a world of canvas and oil pictures paintings that were created by a master of a recent time its easy to become a dr fan if you arent influenced by the not so desirable facets of his personal life

Titulo: interesting intimate view of the artist as a boy
Opinion: an interesting and intimate view of the house where diego rivera was born and lived as a small boy the house serves as a museumgallery with the first of the three floors furnished with the rivera familys 19th century antiques and furniture it feels as if you are walking into someones home into the past the second and third floors have some of riveras portraits of peasants and indigenous people and a nude of frida kahlo there are also some early sketches of some of the artists more famous murals if youre in guanajuato its well worth a stop here theres a nice gift shop too and its also an easy walk from the main plaza if youve seen riveras big murals and other works in mexico city this little museum may not be that impressive but i find it always interesting to see where famous people got their start in life and i think an exploration of riveras first home adds something of value to the image no need for a tour guide as you can browse on your own but if a stop here is included in a tour all the better

Titulo: para empezar a seguirle la pista a diego rivera

Titulo: museo que cambia la perspectiva sobre diego
Opinion: nunca pense que la casa de diego rivera albergara tantas obras por fuera la casona guanajuatense se percibe pequena pero una vez dentro el edificio permite caminar por los cuartos reconstruidos de lo que habria sido la casa donde nacio y crecio diego rivera despues los pisos superiores dejar ver su faceta de pintor de caballete que si bien no fue la principal fue la inicial y permiter adentrarse en su obra mas alla de los archireconocidos murales si bien la expectativa que diego rivera plantea pudiera no ser alcanzada es un museo para profundizar en su obra y en su tiempo como pintor mexicano con un profundo compromiso estetico y social
interesting but limited bc we dont know spanish and all signs are in mexico nobody there to help understand what is in the museum

we accidentally stumbled upon it and it was a nice surprise not just wonderful art but history as well not just an art gallery but period furnishings too a great way to learn more about diego rivera english friendly

Titulo: great view into a slice of diego riveras life plus more
Opinion: there is art by not only rivera but other artists and some of the rooms where diego lived as a child well selected

to see the evolution of diegos style from his childhood on up was a delight the combination of seeing where he spent his early childhood and his works really gave one the sense of understanding this complicated individual a little better if you are a diego fan this is a must stop

el precio que pagas por estar en la casa en la que nacio diego rivera es alto pues aparte de conservar algunos muebles y detalles yo esperaba algo mas interesante en la parte alta ofrecen exposiciones fotograficas y de otros artistas que pueden resultar mas interesantes que la casa en si

its a must when you are in mexico to go to guanajuato and visit diego rivera home and museum its within walking historic centerclose to most attractions the museum shows a lot of his work a small library and some works of local artist carmen is very informative of the life and work of diego

no solo la obra de frida maestro puede ser visto sino tambien los muebles de una epoca que no volvera tiene actividades culturales y cuenta con biblioteca de lectura para ninos en el interior del edificio y sigue siendo un colecciones locales de ventas de la libreria y una pequena tienda en el interior super recomendado

Titulo: birthplace of one of the greatest 20th c mexican artists
Opinion: this is a charming small museum the ground floor has a reconstruction of what the living rooms would have been like rather dark and uncomfortable upstairs there are a number of paintings and drawings by diego rivera some of them quite outstanding there is now a new extension very modern with contemporary mexican works though the building is interesting what is on show at present here is less so

Titulo: small museum like house with the painter memorabilia
Opinion: nice experience to see the house and his memorabilia the visit can be done in 30 minutes or less its within walking distance from the tunnel and the city center

una adicion interesante para aquellos que conocen el trabajo y la vida de diego rivera el documental que se presenta en rivera es un modelo de lo que no se debe hacer al llevar a cabo este tipo de documental

Titulo: para los fanaticos de diego y para los no tanto
Opinion: uno de los museos imperdibles de guanajuato ya que es un lugar con verdadera historia el lugar en donde vivio en su infancia uno de sus grandes hijos si lo que buscas es una coleccion de sus obras mas famosas lamento decirte que aqui no las encontraras ya que principalmente hallaras bocetos de algunos de sus murales y obras de sus etapas mas tempranas que sin embargo si te permitiran entender mejor la vida y obra de este artista tambien hay exposiciones temporales de otros artistas inspirados por diego el precio es muy accesible y esta muy cerca caminando en la misma calle de los mejores museos de guanajuato la alhondiga de granaditas el museo del siglo xix el museo del pueblo y la universidad de guanajuato

Titulo: de los mejores museos de guanajuato
Opinion: muy bonito museo es la casa en donde nacio el famoso pintor hay algunas veces exposiciones temporales visita ampliamente recomendada
conocer una casa de la epoca como vivian las personas ademas de las obras que se albergan en su interior
on the smallish side but very interesting to see the rooms laid out as they once were and a nice selection of paintings
nice spacious museo some rivera and other artists on display first i knew he was persona non grata in his home country worth a visit

beautifully preserved boyhood home of diego rivera we took the guided tour and the gentleman who gave it was incredibly painstaking and detailed about every aspect of riveras life and the displays and art works fascinating and one of a kind

Titulo: para los fanaticos de diego y su amada esposa
Opinion: una cantidad impresionante de obras y algo de historia sobre este polemico y popular artista vale la pena recorrerlo mientras se hace un break del turismo convencional
unexpected selection not common for a town of this size we enjoyed art never seen before a treat for people who are attached to freda and diego
excelente museo de vida y ora de este gran artista mexicano nos ofrece un panorama de como vivia ademas de ofrecernos todas las etapas de diego como artista cuenta con muy buenos cuadros de diego

se debe ir a visitar la casa de diego rivera no creo que sea la mejor coleccion de su obra pero es buena tienen exposiciones temporales y estan agrandando el museo en la 1ra planta hay una senorita que platica los libros publicados de la obra de diego es muy amena y hace un trabajo excelente

no tomes ninguno de los tours en camionetas que ofrecen en hoteles y en la calle solo te llevan de compras y a sitios sin interes historico museos que no son museos solo casas de la risa todo te queda caminando o en taxi mas facil las obras las aprecias super cerca esta de maravilla los muebles hermosos altamente recomendable

extremely valuable and enjoyable little museum located in a three storey building not far from the alhondiga de granaditas it exhibits early work from rivera the earliest piece is from when he was only 12 it is interesting because you can clearly identify how rivera experimented with several techniques and styles before finding his own style its amazing how he really excelled at most techniques that he tried if you like art this is a must see in guanajuato

Titulo: nice small museum with a few interesting paintings
Opinion: this is the house in which diego rivera was born but most of the furnishings are not original in the galleries they have a few of his paintings the most interesting are those from his early days when he was painting in the style of other artists and you can see his evolution as a painter

es la casa donde vivio diego rivera hasta los 6 anos de edad sus padres rentaban ahi un cuarto la coleccion de obras son bocetos de los inicios artisticos de diego es todo un fraude pueden dejar de ir y se ahorran los 35 pesos
hermosas exposiciones de arte en los cinco niveles de la casa en la que crecio el maestro diego rivera cover de 5 miseros pesos algo escondido pero preguntando seguro llegas

Titulo: fabulous collection of rivieras early works
Opinion: this was a great discovery hadnt realized rivera was born in guanajuato first floor is composed of rooms that are restored as they would have been while he was growing up the upper floors contain collections devoted mostly his earlier works when he dabbled in different styles before finding his unique style concentrating on mexican folk art figures and expressionistic murals and the like
tiene mucha historia solo que esta un poco descuidada ademas de que no hay quien te de una explicacion de todo lo que hay en la casa

yo no se como es que la ciudad tiene tan admirables hijos y no les dan tanta importancia diego es uno de los grandes asi como ibarguengoitia y pienso que la esculturita que hicieron es penosamente insultante para este maestraso poner a diego rivera de 150 cuando media 190 aprx y al lado de un basureropone en duda la cultura de la ciudad y del conocimiento cultural de sus gobernantesy en un jardin que no recuerdo donde esta mientras pues ahi estabamos descubrimos la tumba de ibarguengoitia no dice quien es y ni el ano ni nada asi como un pelado cualquiera deberian tener un epitafio digno y una escultura del senor escritor que pena

Titulo: un poco escondido pero vale la pena
Opinion: es sumergirte en la vida de diego rivera tiene muchas obras y bosquejos que te envian a la forma de pensar de un personaje tan importante como lo fue el en la parte superior de la casa hay una sala de exhibicion de obras de otros artistas contemporaneos muy recomendable

this three story home was the first home of diego rivera the ground floor shows the typical furniture and layout of a home of the early 20th century the upper floors have early artworks of diego rivera which gives a great introduction to how his work developed into his later style there is a very modern museum being built or undergoing renos incorporated into the home and beside it which was not open but it will be wonderful once open a beautiful marriage of traditional and ultra modern

i very much enjoyed visiting this museum which is located in the building where diego rivera was born the museum is divided into the various different periods of riveras painting career many interesting paintings and sketches that i had never seen before it also gives a lot of information about his life his connections etc i highly recommend a visit to this museum its in walking distance from the centro
con tan gran personaje es necesario conocerlo mas ademas la casa esta muy acogedora y se pueden apreciar algunos bosquejos del gran maestro
una excelente coleccion de obras de diego rivera y la casa es bonita y puede una darse cuenta como vivia una familia de principios del siglo pasado
el acervo cultural con el que cuenta este museo es de primera asi como la orientacion de todas las obras el lugar se encuentra ubicado a unos pasos de la alhondiga de granaditas

every time i guide a city tour in guanajuato i take my group to this museum i love to let my tourists know about the early years of diego as a child in the house dont miss the exhibition of some of the first art works by diego rivera as student in europe

Titulo: te transporta a otro tiempo es fascinante
Opinion: si pones atencion el museo de diego te transporta a otro tiempo de la era de diego y kahlo por entrar te cobran 30 mxn soy fan de diego y disfrute muchisimo de el museo con todas las pinturas y datos de ellos los cuartos donde diegito aprendio caminar y correr fue muy impresionante para mi pero como todo arte la experiencia como la belleza esta en el quien lo contempla a mi me fue facinante 2 horas deben ser suficientes para cual quier visitante

Titulo: lo mejor la obra de rivera
Opinion: muy centrico y no lleva mucho tiempo la casa en si no es la gran cosa sobre todo porque diego rivera vivio alli hasta los 4 o 5 anos pero tiene una linda coleccion de obras de diego rivera que valen la pena
interesante pero no pude entrar a todas las salas del museo por estar cerradas pregunte cual era el motivo y solo se me indico que abrian mas tarde

es interesante la exhibicion del museo pero lo que mas disfrute fue la excelente atencion de la gente la senora que da explicaciones acerca de los murales es una de las personas mas atentas que nos encontramos en guanajuato en realidad disfrute mucho su platica

Titulo: terrificy if you are a diego rivera fan
Opinion: small museum very well done downstairs a recreation of how riveras famiky home could have been upstairs a small selection of rivera pieces including some vey early pieces specially inteesting are the sketches of murals there is a small auditorium whee a guide tells the atory of the house and some of the paintings we were very lucky one of the museum docents was at the library and told my kid some awesome anecdotes of the house and some of the paintings in the collection i am not sur if she speaks english the convesation was in spanish but it was an awesome exoerience for the whole family and when we went back and saw the collection again we saw it in a completely different light
como soy fanatico de diego rivera me gusto mucho todas las salas y me permitio disfrutar mucho de sus trabajos

la verdad no tenia muchas expectativas al visitar este museo pero es una casa muy interesante con muebles de la epoca de la ninez del artista auditorio con un mural donde se explica el mismo y obras originales de los distintos periodos del artista muy buen museo vale totalmente la pena

Titulo: mas de diego en el museo
Opinion: me gustaron mucho los muebles de epoca que la casa se conserva sin modificaciones y el pequeno auditorio cn fotos de diego peeeero me gustaria que le dieran mas importancia y dedicacion al museo que se sienta mas de diego en el lugar por que fuera de las fotos no nos dice nada mas que lo que nos dirian en otro museo con muebles similares

la verdad se requiere de un buen tiempo para disfrutar de todo lo que el museo ofrece pues no solo el inmueble tambien los muebles las pinturas la historia la sala de proyeccion y por si fuera poco una exposicion de arte moderno extra

el museo todo me encantolas salas estan muy bienmucha informacionel senor guia es muy bueno perohace el recorrido demasiado largo pues se sale de tema a cada ratoesto propicia que despues de un tiempo me haya cansado

me gusto mucho que todavia conserva su decoracion original la casa cuenta con muebles y objetos personales del artista y de su familia tambien se exhiben100 obras originales importantes de su coleccion visitenla les gustara conocer como vivio este ilustre pintor mexicano

Titulo: excellent example of how much mexico esteems artists
Opinion: the house was terrificgreat samples of his artdid not like that it was four stories high with no elevator or airconditioning

la casa de diego rivera es un museo con obra de diego ademas de exposiciones fotograficas la casa es sin duda muy bella pienso que deberian ser mas exigentes con las exposiciones que ponen de exigir calidad porque la que me toco cuando fui no tiene calidad

its a little far fetched thinking that the bassinet is really what diego rivera slept in but its well presented and the upstairs areas with his art in are fantastic to see the diversity of his work worth a visit you can also use the bathroom in there so you can say you sat on the loo of diego

Titulo: so much more than i was expecting
Opinion: this is the museum the overrated delores olmedo museum in mexico city wishes it was the house diego rivera was born in is modest but wellkept the first floor is dedicated too the furnishings he was born into upstairs however is a treat i wasnt expecting many rooms of his paintings sketches photographs many of them from very early in his career and the influence of paris and its art scene at the turn of the 20th century is apparent i loved every piece his sketch of hitler for a mural for rockefeller is amazing

Titulo: interesting display of art in the artists birthplace
Opinion: sketches and paintings from diego riveras early and later years are on display in this house in central guanajuato where he was born and spent the first years of his life the lower rooms are furnished in the style of the late 19th century the upper level rooms have riveras art work on display a video of riveras life is shown in one room

Titulo: en una pequena casa convertida en un museo
Opinion: un curso interesante de su obra y su vida nos gusto incluso los ninos
ver la manera como vivio este artista me transporto a sus tiemposy lo mas hermoso su obra

Titulo: obra de los inicios de diego
Opinion: segun entiendo no vivio mucho tiempo en esa casa sin embargo en el ultimo piso tienen obra de diego donde se pueden ver los inicios de este gran artista vale la pena por eso

Titulo: parece que te hacen un favor
Opinion: llegas y te reciben de mala gana como si te hicieran el favor de dejarte pasar

muy buen museo con obras originales de diego su historia su comienzo en el arte sus experiencias y en la casa donde nacio no dejen de visitarlo ademas esta en camino a conocer la alhondiga y el mercado hidalgo

this is in the childhood home of diego rivera and is outfitted with furniture that was not his or his familys but from that time period i dont really understand posing the rooms as though they were filled with the furnishing that his family used if you are a fan of his art work then the upper floors are worth the visit

Titulo: el amor de un pintor mexico
Opinion: refleja el amor que diego tuvo a mexico mediante la coleccion impresionante de figuritas prehispanicas sus pininos como pintor cuando era nino mostrando su talento desde pequeno diego es grande entre los grnde pintores en al historia de mexico
esmerada atencion y recien remodelado nos gusto toda la orientacion que nos dieron asi como el mapa muy bien explicado

if diego river is your cup of tea then you should definitely check out his childhood home there are some of his lesser works at the museum there arent many of his most famous works there but still quite fun to see where he was born some of his work up close personal most famous or not my favorite part personally was the replica of his dream of a sunday afternoon in alameda the original of which is in mexico city there was information on who each of the people in the mural was or represented if that interests you be prepared to spend an extra hour there

me gusto mucho este museo ya que nos muestra toda la vida de diego rivera desde su infancia nos muestra sus principales obras y hay una area de cine donde puedes ver un documental de su vida ademas hay un espacio donde te hablan de sus murales es un lugar que no deben de dejar de visitar cuando esten en guanajuato ademas de que cobran 5 a los estudiantes
worth going but not high on the priority list not much about him as an artist his boyhood home a little peek into the time period
it has a sense of being in his childghood home where he greww upvery enjoyable
diego home is small but upper level galleries including rotating exhibits more than make up for it lots to see up there oh and its very no photos
es un excelente lugar para conocer como vivio el pintor diego rivera y sus obras me encanto

Titulo: limited display makes this mostly for those paying homage
Opinion: somewhat overrated the downstairs has some musty xixth century furniture supposedly evoking what the home was like when diego rivera was born here upstairs are a handful of galleries some with modern art on termporary loan and some with early diego rivera or sketches for murals under the circumstances a pretty limited displaymade somewhat amusing by the easter altar in the upper landing which was definitely offmessage
aqui se puede encontrar bocetos de diego incluyendo dos desnudos de frida a lapiz que el mismo dibujo

Titulo: se oye el aliento del artista
Opinion: frida kahlo de la casa se encuentra en la ciudad de mexico pero el marido de diego rivera guanajuato nacio nacio y se crio en la casa se ha convertido en un museo video tambien proyecto por su vida junto con el trabajo pequeno pero satisfactorio es un buen ambiente museo
vale la pena disfrutar de la pintura y de la historia de este gran artista mexicano diego rivera

Titulo: decent museum if you have extra time
Opinion: dont visit expecting his famous works the museum focuses on his childhood here and contains some sketches etc i knew his great pieces were not here but i was expecting more substance from this museum

great to see the childhood home of d rivera some of his early work is here which helps to flesh him out as an artist seeing his cubist work and portraits before his murals were fully developed also great house must be great to be a wealthy communist
this was the best display of riveras work sadly i could not take pictures inside
es cierto que es un personaje que forma parte de alguna manera de nuestra hisrtoria pero nada mas

this house doubles as history spot and art collection the base floor recreates the home rivera knew as a boy with pictures and portraits from the family the upper floors which vary in how many are open contain riveras work which span many years and forms after seeing grand murals everywhere to see small objects and be able to look at them at leisure and in detail was great here you can see his imitation of picasso and cezanne and braques and other french notables but always in his own style there are posters sketches watercolors prints and drawings in other words you have all the advantages of a museum without the crowds bags must be checked and photography is off limits if steps are a challenge this will be a challenge did not see an elevator

this small but interesting museum has a nice collection of diego riveras work it was his family home and is an important part of any diegofrida tour with the mural in the national palace and the casa azul both in mexico city the highlights
this collection surprised me with the incredible variety of subjects and artistic styles he mastered definitely worth seeing
shows the many styles of much beloved mexican artist fredas husbandperhaps you saw the movie frida
deberian ampliar un poco mas los horarios ya que en puente o dia de asueto no abren

Titulo: wonderful artwork by diego and others
Opinion: this museum definitely lived up to our expecations it was so interesting to see the wide range of talents diego had as an artist i believe it was only 20 pesos to get in great value
lots of artwork to see and also its kind of neat to see diegos home and furniture from so long ago its only 20 pesos to check it out too
un lugar no tan obligado lleno de nostalgia no lo recomiendo mucho

if you are a fan of diego andor frida you should stop here the only downer was that they dont let you take photos of the pictures we are art fans and visited figures last year to see the dali museum my wife took many pictures there but she was rebuked by the people at diegos home
interesting displays of riveras and some of his contemporaries work the city is clearly proud of their native son well worth an hours visit

so much work you probably had no idea rivera created until i visited this museumhome i didnt know he had experimented with so many different styles nor did i realize how knowledgeable he was of the ancient indigenous artistic techniques great temporary exhibits of important mexican artists on the third or fourth floorlikely someone you should know about but dont come for the art not the house itself
bonito y pequeno museo con originales del artista cuyo lugar de nacimiento con poca gente ver alhondigada y mercado

Titulo: discover other than huge murals by diego
Opinion: it was very interesting to see smaller drawings by diego rivera in many different styles than the murals he became famous for

the house is only moderately interesting whats intriguing are the early works of rivera a reproduction of a mural with a character key and some asianinfluenced watercolors this is not an academic survey of the painters work but rather shows how his work evolved
if nothing else its worth visiting just to see the buildinghouse itself beautifully restored and has a decent collection of rivera stuff also temporary exhibits

Titulo: only one block off the main street
Opinion: how can you not go if youre in guanajuato a quintessential home for this village the home for the most part looks original maybe diego and his brother played on the heavenly worn wood and stone floor a maze of rooms off the center stairwell the second and third floors display the work of rivera all owned by the same collector sometimes there are exhibits of others displayed in the annex good deal and you can check it off you things to see list on the same street asand between the university and the alhondiga de granaditas
small museum in the house that rivera lived in when he was small showed various periods of diego rivera
very reasonable admission fee we enjoyed seeing the house and furniture as well as various styles of paintings that diego rivera did over many years plan about an hour for the visit

Titulo: birthplace of diego rivera amazing works
Opinion: this was our 3rd visit to guanajuato luckily we saw here on tripadvisor the postings about the diego rivera museum it was amazing to see a work he did at 11 years of age this 3 level museum was his home from birth to 6 when his family moved to mexico city but the home remained in the family was donated as a museum about 40 years ago the first floor shows how they lived 100 years ago art loves must see this museum which contains more of his works than any other museum he is famous for his huge murals but these paintings drawings are incredible

i liked the casa rivera and thought it was a nice little museum i found the paintings and sketches interesting and the chronological way they were presented let the viewer see how diegos art progressed if youre only familiar with his great murals youll be surprised at the diffeent styles he experimented with in his youth for only 200 its a wonderful way to learn about one of mexicos greatest artists the gift shop is ok and actually features more prints by fridda kahlo than diego dont miss it

Titulo: its worth the time and the few pesos for admission
Opinion: yes it is the childhood home of well known artist diego rivera the house is old and fairly large and interesting by itself in many of the rooms drawings and paintings by the artist are on display a couple of rooms had other exhibits too you can certainly spend half an hour here unless you are a serious fan of riveras which would mean you would want to spend more time including some in the small museum shop to get to the museum go up at least the hill a full block from the main street that runs through town it is also very near the alhondiga musuem

es un gran museo dado que diego rivera vivio ahi en el museo casa se encuentran muchos de los objetos personales de diego y varias de sus obras el museo consta de 3 pisos y es un buen lugar para visitar y admirar el arte de este fabuloso artista

with only average expections on our part the diego rivera museum turned out to be a delightful experience the combination of the preservation of riveras upper class home near the center of guanajuato along with a good collection of his work is worth a visit in addition at the time of our trip the works of two contemporary and provocative mexican artists who were also featured were every bit as fascinating as those of rivera the museum is lowkey uncrowded and quite interesting
